300.name: Big Daddy
300.description: Adds one additional play and one additional discard per round

301.name: Andrew Ryan
301.description: Increases the player's hand size by 2 cards

302.name: Little Sister
302.description: Gives +100 points and +3 multiplier every time a Joker is played

303.name: Frank Fontaine
303.description: Gives +50 points every time a face card (J, Q, or K) is played

304.name: Security Device
304.description: Gain +3 multiplier for each Spade card you play

305.name: Sander Cohen
305.description: Gain +3 multiplier for each Heart card you play

306.name: Brigid Tenenbaum
306.description: Doubles all points and multipliers from your PowerUp

307.name: Big Sister
307.description: Gives you a bonus on your first play of each round (+200 points, +5 multiplier)

308.name: Plasmid 1
308.description: Gain +7 multiplier for each Ace you play

309.name: Plasmid 2
309.description: Three of a Kind hands become progressively more valuable each time you play one (+20 points; +4 multiplier)

310.name: Welcome to Rapture
310.description: +50 points and +5 multi if player score is odd
